definition: to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: This is the new conveyor belt we had installed last year. We doubled our output in this department as result.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們剛安裝的輸送帶，使我們的產量提高了兩倍。

sentences.english: The technical requirements to light conveyor and processing belts are manifold.
sentences.chinese: 輕型輸送帶和加工安全帶的技術要求是多方面的。

sentences.english: The discharge system for the belt conveyance of the waste rock in the mine well solves these problems.
sentences.chinese: 礦內輸送帶運輸矸石排放系統有效地解決了這些難題。

sentences.english: The traditional way on calculation of distance between two rollers is based on maximum distance of belt droop.
sentences.chinese: 計算託輥間距的傳統方法是根據輸送帶的最大下垂度。

sentences.english: The broken filament woven filtering cloth is suitable for the filter net cloth of the conveying belt.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型適用於輸送帶的過濾網布。

sentences.english: On average it takes 40 years for the conveyor belts to complete a circuit(see diagram).
sentences.chinese: 平均來說，輸送帶每完成一次循環需要40年。

sentences.english: Jiangsu nanjing hh conveyer belt products co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇南京鴻鵠輸送帶製品有限公司。

sentences.english: It is used for cutting conveyer belt and unbalance ends of belt.
sentences.chinese: 割帶機是用來切斷輸送帶和切割不平直的皮帶端頭。

sentences.english: The fabric structures, including the basic structure and the cover structure for multilayer conveyer belts are introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了三至七層輸送帶芯的織物組織。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the design of pressing formational mould that produces belt fastener of band conveyor in miner.
sentences.chinese: 介紹礦用帶式輸送機輸送帶扣衝壓成形模具的設計。

sentences.english: Six colors PAD machine, uses the tooth wheeled conveyor belt, is equipped with 20 locations.
sentences.chinese: 六色移印機，採用齒輪式輸送帶，設有20個工位。

sentences.english: Belt run-out of conveyor is often happened in production.
sentences.chinese: 帶式輸送機的輸送帶跑偏是生產中常見的問題。

sentences.english: Summarizing the significance of developing mine conveyor belt with NBR cover.
sentences.chinese: 概述礦用丁腈橡膠覆蓋膠橡塑整芯輸送帶研製的意義。

sentences.english: The pallet will travel by conveyor belt and be robot placed into one of the CAMO index carousel nests.
sentences.chinese: 托盤將前往輸送帶和迷彩指數傳送帶巢放置機器人。

sentences.english: It can be adjusted to any type of products shape by changing the attachment on the conveyor.
sentences.chinese: 它可以調整到任何類型的產品形狀改變附件的輸送帶。

sentences.english: Turnabout drum is to change the direction of transmission belt.
sentences.chinese: 改向滾筒用於改變輸送帶運行方向。

definition: (jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
